title: A Special Dinner Date in Roppongi
description: Discover upscale restaurants in the Roppongi area, perfect for anniversaries or any special occasion dinner. We introduce establishments where you can enjoy an exclusive time just for two, in fully private rooms or secluded hideaway settings.
content:
# A Special Dinner Date in Roppongi

For an anniversary or a special occasion dinner, you'll want to choose a restaurant that offers a sophisticated ambiance and exquisite cuisine to set the scene for a memorable time together. Here, we introduce restaurants in the Roppongi area perfect for spending quality time with that special someone.

## Innovative Fusion of Thai and Japanese Flavors

<Place id="ChIJCwv0RnmLGGARqpAsMeU0VUA" />
Discover innovative Thai cuisine in Roppongi at this restaurant, a 2024 TabeLog Awards SILVER recipient. It's highly acclaimed for its creative dishes, which brilliantly fuse elements of Thai and Japanese cuisine. From appetizers rich with crab flavor, to tuna and monkfish liver with truffle, a Tom Yum Goong with a Japanese culinary touch, and even incredibly delicious Thai curry – every dish is elaborately crafted and of the highest quality. The wine pairing, perfectly matched to the dishes, is also exquisite, providing that special touch ideal for an anniversary date. Private rooms are available, allowing you to enjoy your meal at leisure without a care for your surroundings.

## Indulgent Yakiniku in Fully Private Rooms

<Place id="ChIJkVT-Vm-LGGARtjXRPAz_JmM" />
This is the ultimate luxury private room yakiniku restaurant located in Nishi-Azabu. Here, a dedicated grilling master for each private room expertly cooks the highest grade Japanese Black Wagyu, such as Tajima beef and Tajima-Gen, to perfection for each cut. The presentation is spectacular, with sesame oil prepared right before your eyes and a hamburger finished just for you. Expect plenty of caviar with your yukke (beef tartare), and even an unexpected oxtail paella as the finale—a gourmet experience that transcends the traditional concept of yakiniku. In this completely private space, you can focus on your conversation and savor the blissful experience of simply enjoying perfectly grilled meat.

## A Secluded French Bistro Hideaway

<Place id="ChIJ3T6e3O2LGGARwHbHCg_w0Wk" />
A subterranean hideaway bistro located a short walk from Roppongi Station towards Nishi-Azabu. The chef, who honed their skills at Restaurant Hiramatsu Honten and Maison Paul Bocuse, showcases their culinary expertise here. The elegant lighting and high ceilings, along with the array of glasses and wines, create a wonderful ambiance. The signature roasted Naruto lotus root and homemade bacon is a must-try – you'll be amazed by the deliciousness of the lotus root. From freshly baked homemade bread and ajillo to beef cheek stewed in red wine, every dish is an exquisite creation conceived with wine in mind. Enjoying it with the wine pairing allows you to fully savor the true essence of a French bistro.

## Enjoy an Unforgettable Night in Roppongi

Whether it's yakiniku in a fully private room, innovative fusion cuisine, or a secluded bistro hideaway, each of these restaurants offers a sophisticated ambiance and exquisite dishes perfectly suited for a special occasion, ensuring your time with your loved one becomes even more memorable.
